duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for managing and facilitating the work flow of sales orders coming into the EDI system for all accounts.
Serves as the prime contact for order-related activities and is responsible for effectively managing the sales order EDI process.
Work with new vendors to implement Retail EDI integration and 3PL for setting up and testing all transactions.
Testing of all EDI transactions and setup of all EDI in Blue Cherry and EDI system for new vendors.
Manage EDI server and work closely with CGS on EDI-related issues, getting bug fixes tested, and automating EDI functions.
Manage GXS Catalog and UPC blocks, and implement new vendor guidelines.
Create/Modify UCC128 labels as per vendor specification and create Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for onboarding vendors and 3PLs.
Daily validation of EDI transactions, comparison of Warehouse shipments emails against Blue Cherry, and investigation of missing receipts.
Creation of EDI8323 and 943 for 3PL based on email notification and management of EDI832 GXS catalog uploads.
Daily processing of invoices and collaboration with the Accounting team to resolve issues with Factor and Customer invoice transmissions.
Management and monitoring of daily ASN EDI856 processes, EDI850 processes, EDI940 pick ticket generation and sending to warehouses, and support Milberg issues and data transmissions.

skills.skill: Blue Cherry and GXS Catalog Management

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (B.A.) from a four-year college or university with a minimum of 5 years of working experience in EDI sales order management or equivalent combination of education and experience
